name: Spring of Pure Sacred Dewdrop
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  This is a relic from a time when the Lochknights still roamed — the knightssaid, there were still loyal spirits in the mountain springs and valleys wherenone tread, guarding those pure, unpolluted springs...  However, the creator of artificial Ichor couldn't tolerate any discord in hisgreat symphony. It is said that wherever the Harmost Boethius went, thenatural nectar was buried, the aqueducts of the empire were built, and thespirits born of pure water vanished without a trace...
